thread.title: Sunny Deol ropes in an aerial cameraperson from New Zealand for 'Ghayal Once Again'
thread.title_full: Sunny Deol ropes in an aerial cameraperson from New Zealand for 'Ghayal Once Again' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Sunny Deol ropes in an aerial cameraperson from New Zealand for 'Ghayal Once Again'
text:
The Mumbai schedule of Sunny Deol’s Ghayal Once Again is currently underway and the actor-producer is keen to show the city “in a different light”. Sunny has flown in New Zealand-based cinematographer Blair Monk, known for his expertise in aerial photography, to shoot a few important scenes. *Sunny Deol*
A source says, ... »
